title: So Riot gave me a mistery skin?
body:
I log on today ,and i got a message that i have recived a mistery skin from riot, but i do not know what i got?
I already had Judgment Kayle skin and i did not get riot one , so how do i even find out what i got?

replies.body: It's going to take some time for every eligible accounts to receive their gifts, so not everything may arrive all at once.  So far, I see that you've received the icon.    If you already have Riot Kayle then you will receive a mystery gift instead per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you).  We'll be posting updates on the roll out of gifts in our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions!
